Other Information.Additional Info: Hydrophilic peptides are preferentially adsorbed while larger proteins are excluded.

Sieving Mechanism: Size-exclusion effect due to narrow pore sizes (3.80 nm and 6.79 nm)

Experimental Validation.Method: MALDI-TOF MS analysis after enrichment by MMP-b-MOFs
Experimental Validation.Performance Metrics: AUC value of 1.000 for distinguishing Crohn's disease from healthy controls

Other Information.Additional Info: The material was used to extract high-quality serum peptide fingerprints, leading to the identification of 8 specific peptide biomarkers for Crohn's disease diagnosis and subtype classification.
